analytic.title: Improved and Generalized Upper Bounds on the Complexity of Policy Iteration

abstract.p: Given a Markov Decision Process (MDP) with n states and m actions per state, we study the number of iterations needed by Policy Iteration (PI) algorithms to converge to the optimal "-discounted optimal policy.
